title: "CRISPR (CRSP) to Begin Clinical Study on Diabetes Therapy Drug"
excerpt: "CRISPR Therapeutics CRSP, along with partner ViaCyte, announced that Health Canada has approved the clinical trial application for its investigational allogeneic stem cell-derived therapy, VCTX210. The candidate will be evaluated as a potential treatment for type 1 diabetes (T1D)."
